global.payment_desc: You will auto-redirect to the course page. If not, please go to the link

projects.relocation_desc: You got a new job and move to the New York. Visit new places and meet a lot of people in the biggest city of the world!

home.title: Welcome
home.game_description_01: You got a new job and move to New York!
home.game_description_02: Open the city, travel to interesting places, meet new freinds with english learning.
home.everywhere_desc:
You can study anytime and anywhere.
Be yourself!
home.anytime_desc:
You have no limits.
Virtual teacher avaliable 24/7.
home.devices_desc: You can easily study with all devices and synchronize your progress
home.introduction: This is an introduction in English.
home.help_desc: Robot understards human speech and records transcript of the lesson. You can use it for tips and quick translation.
home.start_mark_desc: You can start from the beginning using tips
home.review_01:
I have psychological barreir to speak with someone in English.

Now robot helps me get self-confidence and train my english speaking.
home.review_02:
Меня радует цена обучения. За занятия с частным преподавателем приходилось платить в несколько раз больше, а занятия проходили всего 2 раза в неделю.

Оплатила в вашей академии сразу год, прошла основной курс и теперь для поддержании формы созваниваюсь с роботом, который болтает на свободные темы.

I enjoy by course price. I have paid for a private teacher a lot but I had had only 2 lessons per week.

I have passed a course in hi.academy and now I use English in my travels.
home.review_03:
I use the app before work meeting with english speakers.

I launch stage with meeting room where guys talking about office. They listen me while I prepare for my presentation.
home.get_started_text: No phone calls or test lessons with teachers. Get deep into english from the first minutes!
